sentence: In Georgia, he backed former Senator David Perdue in his challenge to incumbent Governor Brian Kemp, who has become Enemy Number One in Trump's view for certifying the election results in the state..
title: Trump has endorsed nearly 130 candidates for 2022, testing his influence in the Republican Party
